i am a cyclist.

I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.

i take my emotions out through art.

content.text: Hey there, I'm about to start my first year of college. I'm really excited but also a little nervous!
Hey! Good for you! What are you going to study in college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm really interested in psychology!
That's awesome! I've always been fascinated by the mind.
Me too! I think it's so cool how our brains work and how they can influence our behavior.
Yeah, it's really amazing. I'm also interested in art, so I love taking my emotions out through painting and drawing.
That's really cool! I love art too, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay! I'm not that great at it either, but I enjoy it so much.
Me too! I love being able to express myself through art.
Yeah, it's a really great way to relax and de-stress.
Yeah, I definitely need to do more of that!
Me too! Maybe we can paint together sometime?
That would be awesome! I'd love to paint with you!
Great! We can exchange numbers and set up a time to meet up.
